  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fuzzerop/opdescriptor">OpDescriptor</a></>}>

</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fuzzerop/sourcepred">SourcePred</a></>}>
A matcher/generator for finding suitable values for the next source in an operation&#39;s partially completed argument list. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fuzzerop/sourcepred/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>
